Articles.Content: I want to make a realistic explosion in blender, but I can't figure out how to make a shockwave and light bending effect. Could be also useful when making blackhole gravitational lens. have you got any ideas?
I don't know exactly how to do this, but [this page](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Blender_3D:_Noob_to_Pro/Ray_Tracing) should help you.
